com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl.operations

Class PartitionAwareOperationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice.impl.operations.PartitionAwareOperationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSerializable, OperationFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PartitionWideEntryWithPredicateOperationFactory, PutAllPartitionAwareOperationFactory

    public abstract class PartitionAwareOperationFactory
extends Object
implements OperationFactory
    Creates partition specific operations. Intended to be used by PartitionIteratingOperation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[] partitions
      Partition-operations will be created for these partition-ids.

      • PartitionAwareOperationFactory

        public PartitionAwareOperationFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • createFactoryOnRunner

        public PartitionAwareOperationFactory createFactoryOnRunner(NodeEngine nodeEngine)
        This method will be called on operation runner node. If PartitionAwareOperationFactory needs to have runner-side state different from caller-side one, this method can be used to create it. Otherwise, stateful factories may cause JMM problems.
        Parameters:
        nodeEngine - nodeEngine

      • createPartitionOperation

        public abstract Operation createPartitionOperation(int partition)
        This method can be called both caller and runner nodes. Creates a partition-operation for supplied partition-id
        Parameters:
        partition - id of partition
        Returns:
        created partition-operation

      • getPartitions

        public int[] getPartitions()
        This method will be called on operation runner node. Created operations by this factory will be run on the partitions returned by this method. Returning null means operations will be run provided partitions by default.
        Returns:
        null to preserve default behaviour or return relevant partition-ids for the operations of this factory.

      • createOperation

        public Operation createOperation()
        Description copied from interface: OperationFactory
        Creates the operation.
        Specified by:
        createOperation in interface OperationFactory
        Returns:
        the created operation.
